<<<<<<< HEAD
The holie historie of King Dauid wherein is chieflye learned these godly and whosome lessons, that is: to haue sure patience in persecution, due obedience to our prince without rebellion: and also the true and most faithfull dealings of friendes. Drawne into English meetre for the youth to reade; by Iohn Marbeck. Merbecke, John, ca. 1510-ca. 1585.
71, [1] p.
Printed by Henrie Middleton, for Iohn Harison, At London : Anno. 1579.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
The holie historie of King Dauid wherein is chieflye learned these godly and whosome lessons, that is: to haue sure patience in persecution, due obedience to our prince without rebellion: and also the true and most faithfull dealings of friendes. Drawne into English meetre for the youth to reade; by Iohn Marbeck. Merbecke, John, ca. 1510-ca. 1585.
71, [1] p.
Printed by Henrie Middleton, for Iohn Harison, At London : Anno. 1579.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
